what: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
title: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
text: data package contains data set registered elevator devices New York City provided Department Buildings response September 2015 FOIL request.

title: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
text: can install development version elevators like :

title: Data Package Containing Information About Elevators in NYC
text: One fundamental characteristics elevators fast can go, much can carry  addition borough, number geographical variables can useful explore  can also see different tall buildings Manhattan
code: library(elevators) library(ggplot2)  elevators |>   ggplot(aes(speed_fpm, capacity_lbs)) +   geom_point(alpha = 0.1) elevators |>   ggplot(aes(longitude, latitude, color = borough)) +   coord_map() +   geom_point(alpha = 0.1) +   theme_minimal() library(tidyverse)  elevators |>   filter(borough == "Manhattan") |>   mutate(floors = str_extract(floor_to, "\\d+"),          floors = as.numeric(floors)) |>   filter(!is.na(floors), floors < 100, floors > 0) |>   ggplot(aes(longitude, latitude, color = floors)) +   geom_point(alpha = 0.05) +   scale_color_viridis_c() +   theme_minimal() +   facet_wrap(~ cut_width(floors, width = 10, boundary = 0))

title: Elevators in NYC — elevators
text: data set containing information subset elevators NYC. data set filtered contain active elevators non-missing speed.

title: Elevators in NYC — elevators
text: data frame 35042 rows 25 variables: device_number Unique identify number elevator bin Building Identification Number borough Regional subdivisions NYC. One "Manhattan", "Bronx", "Brooklyn", "Queens", "Staten Island" tax_block Id tax block. Smaller borough tax_lot Id tax block. Smaller tax_block house_number House number, poorly parsed. Use caution street_name Street name, poorly parsed. Use caution zip_code Zip code, formatted 5 digits. 0 99999 marked NA device_type Type device. common type "Passenger Elevator" lastper_insp_date Date, refers last periodic inspection Department Buildings. dates longer accurate, collected November 2015 approval_date Date approval elevator manufacturer Name manufacturer, poorly cleaned. assigned NA travel_distance Distance travelled, cleaned. Mixed formats speed_fpm Speed feet/minute capacity_lbs Capacity lbs car_buffer_type Buffer type. buffer device designed stop descending car counterweight beyond normal limit soften force elevator runs pit emergency. Takes values "Oil", "Spring", NA governor_type Governor type, overspeed governor elevator device acts stopping mechanism case elevator runs beyond rated speed machine_type Machine type, labels unknown. safety_type Safety type, labels unknown. mode_operation Operation mode, labels unknown. floor_from Lowest floor, cleaned. Mixed formats floor_to Highest floor, cleaned. Mixed formats latitude Latitude elevator longitude Longitude elevator elevators_per_building number elevators building

title: Elevators in Maryland — md_elevators
text: data set containing information subset elevators Maryland. Last updated July 28th 2022.

title: Elevators in Maryland — md_elevators
text: data frame 25204 rows 15 variables: location_name  location_type  county  location_address  registration_number  status  certificate_expiration_date  equipment_type  equipment_capacity  equipment_speed  equipment_travel  owner_contact  owner_contact_2  inspection_type  last_inspection_date
